name: Will Leitch
text: Nothing else open for miles around on a Sunday halfway through a four hour bike ride. It was this or Subway. I never eat fast food. We were pleasantly surprised. Veggie pizza had fresh baby spinach and was drizzled with balsamic vinegar. â€¦More

name: John Chrissikos
text: Believe me, this place had the best food and best service in town. But one day out of the blue the regional manager came in, and told all the workers they have to go and they permanently closed. Very poor choice doing that

name: Michaela Ryerson
text:
Never received my breadsticks or ranch that was clearly marked on my reciept. Went back in to correct the order and had to pay for it again.
Not the first time I didn't receive part of my order. Although this is the first time I had to pay for something I already paid for.

name: Shawn Gardner
text: The Mexico Pizza Hut makes damn Good Pizza fast and curdious. the workers are pleasent and management is really terrific.. One time they made a slight mistake on my order.. and they gave me a free large pizza of my choice. was Awesome.  Thanks Pizza Hut.

name: Caroline James
text: Fast delivery,  excellent service, and good pizza. My order is always right,  the pizza comes hot, and delivery drivers are curteous.

name: Bryan Lucas
text: Great customer service. New manager. He's awesome

name: hugo nope
text: It 30 dollars for 4 people the good wasn't to good and the sauce  is water

name: John Ross
text: Best pizza in town . The hotdog pizza crust is out of this world

name: Greg DeCristofaro
text: Everyone is very nice in there, the food isn't bad, and if it isn't too busy they will deliver out of the delivery zone for me

name: Bryan Bouchard
text: To bad they closed up shop. Was nice

name: Christopher Massey
text: Delivered a real premium product - and fast, too. Even the crust - which wasn't a specialty crust - was perfect, too

name: Andrew Dyment
text: pizza hut is a awesome place to  order out
